name: Penguin Executioner
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Special Summoned: Return 1 "Penguin" monster from your GY to the Deck, then draw 1 card. At the start of the Damage Step, if a "Penguin" monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that opponent's monster. You can only use each effect of "Penguin Executioner" once per turn.
